name: Plane Craze
description:
Plane Craze is a SURVIVAL BULLET HELL where you must survive as long as you can and get upgrades to destroy the enemy planes.  You can get temporary upgrades, coins and health from enemies, with coins you can buy unlimited upgrades from the shop, but be careful, if you die, all your coins get lost! Controls: 
  • Mouse - Movement
  • Left Click - Shoot upwards
  • Right Click - Shoot backwards
  • Left Shift - Dodge plane and bullets
  • Esc - Pauses game

If you find any bugs or glitches, please contact me or leave a comment about it, thanks.
